p: Our approach was informed by a broader theoretical framework in that we utilized simultaneous data collection and analysis as well as a method of constant comparison (Charmaz 2006). As Braun and Clarke have suggested, the flexibility of thematic analysis permitted the parallel use of both inductive (data driven) and deductive (theory driven) approaches (Braun and Clarke 2006). This flexibility permitted us to address certain concepts we knew a priori to be present as well as those we knew little about, the uncertainties around adherence behaviors.
